data.title: Home
data.meta_description: The University of California is the world’s leading public research university system. With 10 campuses, 5 medical centers, 3 national labs and a network of agricultural and natural resource centers, UC boasts large numbers of distinguished faculty and researchers in every field.
data.text:
Join our vibrant community

We just admitted our largest and most diverse class in our history. Applying to UC is a lot simpler than you think. That’s because you can apply for as many campuses as you like — with just one application.

UC announces record-breaking admissions for fall 2024

“Even from the smallest thing, like a book, all the way up to my entire tuition, there was all kinds of financial support.”

Miguel Tamayo, B.S.

Class of 2023, UC Santa Cruz

Watch Miguel’s story

Think you can't afford UC? Think again.

UC tuition is fully covered for more than half of California students. That’s no typo. For most in-state students, if your household income is $100K or less, your UC Tuition payment is ZERO.

10 surprising facts about UC costs

82% of undergrads come from California

2 out of 3 California students who applied last year got in.

54% of California undergrads pay no tuition

UC has one of the strongest financial aid programs in the nation.

86% of undergrads earn a diploma

Most students complete their studies in just over four years.
